title: Movie Maker
description: A single-page-app that allows a movie producer to set a budget and select elements to include in thier film without going over budget

title: Ex Tracker
description: A single page app that allows a user to track the day to day whereabouts of that one person they cannot stand to be near.

title: Travel Diary
description: A single-page-app allowing a user to enter a journal entry about the places they have been to.

title: Chatty Coulrophobia
description: NSS Cohort E7 Group Project - A basic messaging app with some custom features such as a chatbot, emoji picker, and custom theme creator.

title: Flying Buttresses - In a Nutshell
description: NSS Cohort E7 Group Project - A single-page-app featuring a friends list, message board, task list, favorite articles, and an events board.
